entry.title: Clover Point (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that untreated sewage was dumped directly into the ocean from Clover Point (pictured) until 2020?

entry.title: Fathimath Dheema Ali (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Fathimath Dheema Ali is the first Olympic qualifier from the Maldives?

entry.title: Rhapsody (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Rhapsody was the hardest traditional climbing route in the world?

entry.title: Rashmika Mandanna (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Rashmika Mandanna was reluctant to accept her first role in Hindi cinema as she disagreed with the character's views on spirituality?

entry.title: aid climbing (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the aid climbing routes on the Great Trango Tower are some of the longest vertical big wall climbs in the world?

entry.title: Evann Girault (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Evann Girault is Niger's first Olympic fencer?

entry.title: Hercules (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the neutral oil tanker Hercules carried an unexploded bomb into a Brazilian port after being attacked by Argentine aircraft during the Falklands War?

entry.title: Goodboy Galaxy (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Goodboy Galaxy was the first commercially released video game for the Game Boy Advance in more than 13 years?

entry.title: Quintus et Ultimus Watson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Quintus et Ultimus Watson was the acting governor of Texas for one day in 1915?
